title: Clicking or Popping Noise When Turning
symptom_short: Clicking or popping noise when turning at low speed

likely_causes.cause: Damaged or torn CV boot allowing grease loss

recommended_checks: Note if noise is louder on full-lock turns.
Inspect CV boots for tears or grease sling.
Replace axle assembly if joint is worn.
safety_warning: Severely worn CV joints can fail and leave the vehicle without drive.

title: Vibration During Acceleration

likely_causes.cause: Worn inner CV joints or axle imbalance

recommended_checks: Observe whether vibration changes with speed or throttle.
safety_warning: Persistent driveline vibration can accelerate wear of drivetrain components.

title: Whining Noise That Changes With Speed
symptom_short: Whining or humming noise that changes with vehicle speed

likely_causes.cause: Differential gear wear or low fluid

recommended_checks: Note if noise changes when turning left or right.
Check differential fluid level and condition.
safety_warning: Failed bearings or differential components can overheat and seize.

title: Clunk When Shifting From Drive to Reverse
symptom_short: Clunk felt or heard when shifting between gears

likely_causes.cause: Excessive play in driveshaft or CV joints
Worn engine, transmission, or differential mounts

recommended_checks: Inspect mounts and driveline joints for play.
safety_warning: Excessive driveline play can lead to component damage if ignored.

title: Binding or Hopping on Tight Turns (AWD/4WD)
symptom_short: Vehicle binds or hops during tight low-speed turns

likely_causes.cause: Worn or mismatched tires affecting AWD system

recommended_checks: Check tire sizes and tread depth consistency.
Service transfer case or AWD coupling if needed.
safety_warning: Driving with driveline binding can damage transfer case and differentials.
